description: The queen of Disco-known now for her fundamental conservatism but then known for her extended sex romps that pulsated as minutes turned to hours-Donna Summer recorded a series of hits that playfully courted decadence and consistent chart success. The versions here are the shorter 7" versions. So if looking for the full 16-minute version of "Love to Love You Baby," look elsewhere. But what is here is '70's disco at it's peak: "Hot Stuff," "Bad Girls," "Last Dance," "On the Radio," "I Feel Love." the kind of stuff that makes weddings and frat parties what they are.

title: On the Radio
